title: Searge: 马上发布1.9.1-pre2
author: chyx
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2016-3-10 21:33 编辑 

Searge@SeargeDP

If you didn't guess it already, yes, 1.9.1-pre2 will soon be released, because pre1 turned out to be rather unstable and crashed a lot.
如果你还没猜到，没错，1.9.1-pre2将要马上被发布了，因为pre1不可靠还老是崩溃
